entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
